column1: #Text=It's in the nature of elections that they have winners and losers. if a woman is running against a man, sometimes the woman wins and sometimes she loses.
#Text=A progressive woman has no difficulty embracing progressive women in positions of power.
#Text=However, the USA is not a progressive society and Hillary Clinton is very definitely NOT a progressive woman.
#Text=In fact, she is probably the only candidate the Democrats could have nominated who could have lost that election.
#Text=Elizabeth Warren, to take one example, almost certainly would have produced a different outcome.
